== Introduction ==
{| class="wikitable"
|-
| Ubuntu-ku simply provides a desktop CD that includes all Kurdish language packs from main to allow the user a better localized Ubuntu experience without downloading anything from the internet. So this is just a remix of the packages from the main repository, there are no other changes or additions.
| {{https://librarian.launchpad.net/5622193/ubuntu-tux_150px.png}}
|}
